name: allie's character creator
description:
** please play on desktop! not sure if it will work on mobile :)

this is my FIRST full complete project!! its pretty simple but im really proud of it :) in the future, there are a lot of things id do differently, but for a first project im so happy!! tag me @allie.mews on instagram if you play this game with your character :D

also just a note, the eyes are a little buggy! sorry bout that :)

to play, click each icon to switch between the different options. you can click the paint to switch the color of the thing you are changing! click the camera so the buttons go away so you can take a screenshot :)
